title: David Yurman Font
content:
Hello. Looking for more information about the attached font used by David Yurman. Any info appreciated.

Best,  
Erik

Font: 

 TF Arrow 

Solved By: 

 [Mike F](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015855/http:/typophile.com/user/3368 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [davidyurman.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015855/http:/typophile.com/files/davidyurman.png) | 62.7 KB |
| [yurman\_vs\_arrow.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015855/http:/typophile.com/files/yurman_vs_arrow.png) | 22.15 KB |
author: ErikSyrup

comments.content: I think it's a manually stretched [TF Arrow](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015855/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/TFArrow_interiors.php) - although, because Joe Treacy's new website doesn't have font testing capability working yet, I can't tell you which variant of Arrow.

I would say that is a very good guess indeed!  
Many Thanks!
